HUNTSVILLE SPACE ACADEMY
6 DAYS/ 5 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”39px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|53px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”25px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL TO ATLANTA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”70px” custom_margin=”-23px||29px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

Arrive in Atlanta International Airport and transfer to the hotel. Dinner in the evening at the restaurant and leisure time at the hotel.

Overnight in Atlanta.

DAY 02: COCA COLA WORLD & CNN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-23px||56px|||” custom_padding=”1px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

After breakfast at the hotel proceed to Coca Cola World Tour. There is plenty to see and do at World of Coca‑Cola. You can visit the vault where legendary secret formula for Coca‑Cola is secured and taste 100+ beverages from around the world. You may even meet and take your picture with the Coca‑Cola Polar Bear.

Later proceed to CNN Center Tour, get exclusive, behind-the-scenes access to the world headquarters of CNN with this tour experience. You will take a 50-minute walking tour with your very own guide through the halls of CNN Center and get an inside look at how a live broadcast is produced and sent to viewers all over the world. You will also get a more in-depth look at how the world’s largest news organization operates. From the historic first newscast to the now living legacy, learn how CNN became the worldwide leader in news. Later proceed to lunch at local food restaurant. In the afternoon enjoy some shopping at the Perimeter Mall one of the best shopping place in Atlanta. After a fun filled day we will proceed to dinner at the restaurant.

Overnight in Atlanta.

        

DAY 03: PROCEED TO HUNTSVILLE CAMP FOR THREE DAYS – 2 NIGHTS PROGRAM

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-49px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

After an early breakfast checkout from hotel and proceed to Huntsville Space Camp by motor coach.

Upon arrival, lunch at the restaurant and proceed to the camp & check-in.

DAY 04: PATHFINDER PROGRAM AT HUNTSVILLE SPACE & ROCKET CENTER

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-24px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

Pathfinder provides an exciting introduction to Space Camp, Aviation Challenge Camp or Space Camp Robotics in three-day, two-night programs for the groups.

Space Program Activities: 
Build a model rocket, train like an astronaut and work in mission control or launch as part of the flight crew on a simulated space mission!

  • Simulated Space Mission
  • Five Degrees of Freedom Chair
  • Multi-Axis Trainer
  • Public Museum Simulators
  • Gift Shop
  • Movie **
  • On-site meals

DAY 05: SPACE CAMP GRADUATION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-34px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

 

Check out and attend the graduation ceremony. After the graduation ceremony proceed to Atlanta by road. Lunch en-route at a local restaurant, upon arrival check-in at the hotel and enjoy some free time.

Later in the evening enjoy the dinner at a restaurant and stay overnight.

DAY 06: VISIT GEORGIA AQUARIUM & DEPARTURE

Our journey comes to an end today. Breakfast and checkout proceed to visit the second largest aquarium in the world. The Georgia Aquarium contains more than one hundred thousand animals, representing 700 species of fish and other sea creatures. The aquarium is the only institution outside of Asia that houses whale sharks, which are kept in a 6.3 million US gallons (24,000 m3) exhibit—the aquarium was designed around the whale shark exhibit. Their importation from Taiwan (by air, truck, and boat) had never been attempted previously. Head to the 4-D theater for an immersive underwater adventure you have to see and feel, to believe, or stop off at the tide pools where you can touch the smooth shells of horseshoe crabs or the fuzzy legs of sea stars. Before you leave, do not forget to swing by the dolphin tank to watch and learn about the playful antics of bottlenose dolphins.

Meal Vouchers will be provided for lunch at in Aquarium. In the afternoon transfer to the airport for your flight back home with memories that are sure to last a lifetime.
